name: Netskope Tenant (Required)
description: This plugin is required to configure Netskope Tenant in Cloud Exchange. The Netskope Tenant will be used by the Netskope plugins to fetch the required data for each module.

configuration.label: V1 API Token (Optional)
configuration.description: Optional V1 API token to authenticate Netskope Tenant. V1 Token can be obtained from the Netskope Tenant Settings -> Tools -> REST API v1.

configuration.label: V2 API Token
configuration.description: V2 API token to authenticate Netskope Tenant. V2 Token can be obtained from the Netskope Tenant Settings -> Tools -> REST API v2.
